text: Nakhoina paba amadi lousinba ngamgadabasing adukhaktamak eikhoina nakhoida ijari. Adubu Ibungo Jisugi Numit aduda nakhoina eikhoigidamak chaothokchanaba aduga eikhoina nakhoigidamak chaothoknanaba nakhoina houjik madu machet khaktada khanglabasu, madu nakhoina mapungphana khanglakkani haina asa toujei.
